alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 7:41PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dillon, northeastern Darlington and eastern Marlboro Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 741 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Brownsville, or 11 miles south of Bennettsville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Mccoll, Clio, Bingham, Brownsville, Dunbar, Minturn, Blenheim, and Tatum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
